section.title: Choose Expressions
section.para: Choose expressions pattern match on union types, allowing different code paths based on which variant is present.

section.title: Choose on Variant Construction
section.para: Choose can match directly on constructed variants.

entry.programlisting: define Option union(Some: int, None) choose Option.Some(7): when v: Some: v else 0
define Option union(Some: int, None) choose Option.None: when v: Some: v else 0

section.title: Choose with Binding
section.para: When a variant carries a value, the value can be bound to a name.

entry.programlisting: define Result union(Ok: int, Err: int) choose Result.Ok(42): when x: Ok: x + 1 else 0
